SummaryEnglish: So let me tell you my unfortunate story. My name is Yuuta and when I was in middle school I had teenage delusions of grandeur. But I graduated from my dark past in middle school, and was on my way to sail smoothly through high school. That should have been the end of it, but there was an accident… which I kinda expected would happen. And because of that accident, I’ve now been forced into a contract with Rikka, another victim of teenage delusions of grandeur, and now she has messed up my life! Stop encouraging my teenage delusions of grandeur!!
Aliases: Even People with Adolescent Delusions of Grandeur Want To Experience Love!
Chuunibyou demo Koi ga Shitai! Ren
Love, Chunibyo and Other Delusions! Heart Throb
Chu-2 Byou demo Koi ga Shitai!
Regardless of My Adolescent Delusions of Grandeur, I Want a Date!

1.SummaryEnglish: With Christmas fast approaching, Rikka and Nibutani plan a Christmas party at Sanae's Mansion after Makoto's suggestion. Chaos ensues at the party as Rikka and Yuta continue exploring their burgeoning relationship.

2.TitleEnglish: The Rikka Wars (Apocalypse of the Wicked Lord Shingan Reborn)
2.SummaryEnglish: Problems arise for Yuta and Rikka after Makoto gives Yuta a USB containing pictures of an idol that he had a crush on in middle school. After Rikka asks Yuta to return the stick, he secretly keeps it and Rikka finds after sneaking into his room.

3.TitleEnglish: Love, Chunibyo & Other Delusions! Rikka Version
3.SummaryEnglish: After Rikka Takanashi wakes up in the clubroom to what appears to be a nightmare of a wedding, she tells Sanae Dekomori and Kumin Tsuyuri the story about how she first met Yūta Togashi, and how they ended up bound to one another. The film is a retelling of the first season told from Rikka's perspective, which provides transition scenes for the second season.

4.TitleEnglish: Love, Chunibyo & Other Delusions! the Movie: Take On Me
4.SummaryEnglish: Rikka is now a third-year student, but she still has "chunibyo" syndrome. University entrance exams loom on the horizon, and it's spring break, and Yuuta and Rikka are together as usual. One day, Rikka's older sister Touka declares that she's going to take Rikka to Italy with her, as Touka is moving to Italy for work and she thinks they should move together as a family. Yuuta understands Touka's opinion, but thinks that at this rate he and Rikka will be separated. Shinka and the other members suggest that Yuuta and Rikka should "elope," and thus sets the stage for Yuuta and Rikka's travels throughout Japan in their escape drama.

5.SummaryEnglish: With Rikka refusing to take off her eyepatch, Yūta attempts to train her in playing volleyball to compensate for her lack of depth perception.

6.TitleEnglish: Chuni-Shorts 2: The Wicked Lord Shingan - The Dawning
6.SummaryEnglish: In middle school, Rikka's friend Tomo has to deal with Rikka's slow descent into delusion.

7.SummaryEnglish: Yuta's younger sister Kuzuha deals with her brother during his chūnibyō phase.

8.TitleEnglish: Chuni-Shorts 4: I'm Making Meat and Potato Stew!
8.SummaryEnglish: Yūta's little sister Yumeha goes with Rikka to shop for cooking ingredients.

9.SummaryEnglish: Kumin talks about her hobby of sleeping and her observations of the other club members.

10.SummaryEnglish: Shinka and Sanae get into a heated water balloon fight against each other.

11.SummaryEnglish: Nibutani attempts to wake Kumin up, but somehow Kumin keeps dodging. Is she REALLY asleep?

12.TitleEnglish: Chunibyo Lite! 2: The Disease Commonly Known as 'Monomorai' or 'Mebachiko' or 'Meibo'
12.SummaryEnglish: In the clubroom, Yūta Togashi deals with Rikka Takanashi, who puts on a second eyepatch on her left eye after she gets infected with a stye, making her spatially blind. The other girls listen from the outside when Yūta tries to apply eye drops into Rikka's infected left eye.

13.TitleEnglish: Chunibyo Lite! 3: Wicked Lord Shingan - Storm Chapter
13.SummaryEnglish: One day in junior high school, Tomo was roped into helping Rikka develop her apparent abilities. Rikka used Zener cards to test clairvoyance and determined the gender of who entered the classroom to test foresight, both with negative results.

14.SummaryEnglish: In the clubroom, Yūta, Kumin, and Makoto Isshiki witness Shinka and Sanae Dekomori playing a game of Old Maid. After ten minutes, the game reaches a climax, in which the last card is torn in half due to Sanae refusing to hand it over to Shinka, thus they both lose and continue to bicker on their way home on a rainy day.

15.TitleEnglish: Chunibyo Lite! 5: My Brother 3 - Camping Chapter
15.SummaryEnglish: Kuzuha Togashi deals with Yūta during his chūnibyō persona during a camping trip. While going to fetch water at a nearby stream, Yūta protects Kuzuha from chestnuts on the ground. The rest of the family later enjoys a meal of curry, but Kuzuha notices that Yūta is sitting by the campfire with a block of meat.

16.SummaryEnglish: In the past, Shinka and Satone Shichimiya spent a day with their two friends attempting to summon an archangel via summoning circle. The paper vessel ended up flying up in the sky due to the wind. In the present, Satone tells this story to Kumin in the clubroom, which embarrasses Shinka.

17.TitleEnglish: Rikka Version Lite: My Older Brother 2
17.SummaryEnglish: Special Episode included with Love, Chunibyo & Other Delusions!: Rikka Version

18.TitleEnglish: Kotatsu Photo Session: ~A Parting… Dark Memoria~
18.SummaryEnglish: Kumin finds an old camera after taking a nap in an unusual place. The camera may be haunted, but that only gives the girls more reason to try it out

19.TitleEnglish: Kotatsu Photo Session: ~Mind Erosion… From An Alternate Dimension~
19.SummaryEnglish: Kumin finds another old camera in another questionable napping spot. Does this camera taking photos from another dimension?

20.SummaryEnglish: Sophia Ring SP Saturn VII joins the girls for another Photo Session. The girls discuss what it means to be Photogenic & recruit another surprise model

21.TitleEnglish: Depth of Field: Love and Hate Theater Phase I
21.SummaryEnglish: Rikka and Sanae face each other in an epic mecha battle in an apocalyptic setting. Included in the BD/DVD Vol.1

22.TitleEnglish: Depth of Field: Love and Hate Theater Phase II
22.SummaryEnglish: Six hours and twenty-four minutes earlier, Sanae confronts Rikka before boarding her ultimate mech, Décolleté. Included in the BD/DVD Vol.2

23.TitleEnglish: Depth of Field: Love and Hate Theater Phase III
23.SummaryEnglish: After dodging Sanae's advances, Rikka boards her own ultimate mech, Königin der Nacht, and returns fire. Included in the BD/DVD Vol.3

24.TitleEnglish: Depth of Field: Love and Hate Theater Phase IV
24.SummaryEnglish: A flashback reveals that Rikka betrayed her army because her superiors ordered her to attack civilians, before Rikka and Sanae resume the fight. Included in the BD/DVD Vol.4

25.TitleEnglish: Depth of Field: Love and Hate Theater Phase V
25.SummaryEnglish: While fighting, a glimpse shows Sanae and Rikka being happy together in a field, though Sanae plans to defeat them. Included in the BD/DVD Vol.5

26.TitleEnglish: Depth of Field: Love and Hate Theater Last Phase
26.SummaryEnglish: Sanae and Rikka end up with a final standoff, but Rikka turns off Königin der Nacht, thus losing the battle. In reality, Sanae and Rikka were just fighting in the clubroom while wearing boxes. Included in the BD/DVD Vol.6

27.TitleEnglish: Depth of Field: Love and Hate Theater Extra Phase
27.SummaryEnglish: Rikka imagines a scene where Sanae kidnaps Yūta Togashi, but Rikka tickles Sanae. Included in the BD/DVD Vol.7

28.TitleEnglish: Heated Table Series: Shiritori Under the Kotatsu
28.SummaryEnglish: The girls play a game of Shiritori at the Kotatsu, a Japanese word game where each player must say a word starting with the final kana of the previous word. But one of the girls plays dirty

29.SummaryEnglish: The girls try to guess what Dekomori uses as weights in her Mjolnir Hammer buns

30.SummaryEnglish: Mori Summer wants to talk about love, but with Rikka the only one with a love interest & her not having much to say about it the tables turn to Dekomori. Mori Summer is surprised to discover that Deko has something to contribute to the discussion of love aside from her love for her Master

31.TitleEnglish: Heated Table Series: Hot Pot Discussion
31.SummaryEnglish: The girls discuss their favorite types of Hot Pot

32.TitleEnglish: All Time All Places on the Beach
32.SummaryEnglish: At the beach, Rikka, Shinka, Kumin and Sanae, play a second round of the game of word chains. Wanting to avenge her previous loss to Shinka, Rikka struggles in naming "cool fruits".

33.SummaryEnglish: At the apartment, Rikka tries to figure out with Yūta Togashi and Kuzuha Togashi as to why their pet cat Chimera has gained weight even after giving birth. They soon learn that Satone Shichimiya and Tōka Takanashi have each been secretly feeding Chimera behind their backs.

34.SummaryEnglish: After failing her English pop quiz, Rikka takes a supplementary lesson from Nanase Tsukumo in the clubroom, while Yūta, Shinka, Kumin, Sanae and Makoto Isshiki take watch. Nanase even implements the use of "translating" the name of Rikka's umbrella, Schwarz Sechs Perfect Customize Guerzoniansus, into the supplementary lesson.

1.TitleEnglish: Chance Encounter... with Wicked Lord Shingan
1.SummaryEnglish: After recovering from adolescent delusions, Yuta transfers schools to begin anew. As he tastes the succulent fruit of normalcy, Rikka Takanashi discovers Yuta's delusional past and declares that they are soul mates, which makes things anything but normal.

2.SummaryEnglish: Yuta wants to crush on the beautiful Shinka, but Rikka's antics prohibit it. A visit to Rikka's house reveals how delusional she really is. Her eclectic collections are almost stranger than her behavior! What's worse: Rikka's sister knows about Yuta's past!

3.SummaryEnglish: Yuta tries to decide what club to join, but Rikka is already a step ahead of him. She creates the "Far-Eastern Magic Society" and manages to rope in two members. Given a provisional club status, Yuta revokes his membership... until Shinka joins the club, too.

4.SummaryEnglish: Yuta is puzzled that Nibutani wants to join Rikka's club. He wonders if she could really like him back, but the answer he gets isn't the one he imagined!

5.SummaryEnglish: Rikka and Yuta face their low grades, and their club is fingered as the culprit! Rikka begins a new battle with her latest opponent: math! Meanwhile, Dekomori and Nibutani continue to butt heads.

6.SummaryEnglish: Rikka makes club uniforms for everyone, further humiliating Yuta; tension between Nibutani and Dekomori continues to grow. Isshiki receives a love letter, but his plans hit a snag before they even begin.

7.SummaryEnglish: A trip to Rika's hometown reveals more about her than Yuta had anticipated. Dekomori continues her antics against her nemesis "Mori-Summer". Yuta and Rika escape the house and end up in a place Rika holds dear to her heart.

8.TitleEnglish: Exiled... Just the Two of Them
8.SummaryEnglish: After refusing to face the truth about her father, Rikka "retreats" to her home with Yuta in tow. Makoto is finding it tough to figure out his feelings for Kumin, and Yuta shares a night together with Rikka that impacts them both in a very meaningful way.

9.SummaryEnglish: The school festival is on, and amidst Shinka's attempts to turn their club into something legitimate, Rikka battles strange feelings that she only experiences when Yuta is around. Shinka decides to help her understand these feelings, but Rikka's full blown case of chunibyo keeps getting in the way.

10.SummaryEnglish: Rikka and Yuta each gets some advice from a friend. Rikka's sister reveals her intention of studying the culinary arts in France, and asks Yuta to help her with Rikka. Through their own special ways, Yuta and Rikka confess to each other.

11.SummaryEnglish: Rikka begins to acclimate herself to living a normal life, successfully making friends in the process. Sanae, however, isn't too happy about it. Rikka heads off to visit her father's grave, with Yuta left at the station, waiting for her to return.

12.SummaryEnglish: Yuta begins to worry when it becomes apparent that Rikka may not come back. Sanae ditches her Dekomori persona to follow Rikka, while Kumin "inherits" Wicked Lord Shingan's powers. Yuta can't bear being without Rikka and sets off to find her.

1.SummaryEnglish: Unusual circumstances forces Yuta and Rikka to live under one roof. Keeping it under wraps is top priority as the new school year starts.

2.SummaryEnglish: Nibutani becomes obsessed with the state of Yuta and Rikka's questionable romance, and pressures Yuta to take control of his girlfriend and lead her down the righteous path of boy-girl relationships.

3.SummaryEnglish: Rikka becomes very excited about the presence of a magic user she is supposedly doing unvisible battle with, but it soon becomes apparent that this magic user is an actual person. She is a girl Yuta knows from his middle school days who first infected him with chunibyo. Rikka is both fascinated and terrified of the threat the new girl poses to her and Yuta's love contract, and either wants to be friends with her or be rid of her for all eternity.

4.TitleEnglish: The Election for President of the Student Council (Queen Maker)...of Purity
4.SummaryEnglish: Nibutani attempts to run for Student Council president, but a pesky little blonde girl is foiling her every attempt at normalcy. What can she do to keep her in check? The unthinkable...

5.TitleEnglish: Meeting of the Club Delegates Meeting
5.SummaryEnglish: In danger of losing the club room, The Magical Napping Society - Summer thereof decides to do the only club activity that the student council will accept: competitive napping!

6.TitleEnglish: Travelling to the Island of Tsukushi... of Hesitation
6.SummaryEnglish: The class trip is here, and while Rikka and Dekomori must separate, now is a good time for her to get some alone time with Yuta... if their class mates let them!

7.SummaryEnglish: Togashi hopes to spend the entire day alone with Rikka, but Shichimiya somehow finds her way to the couple, dragging them into her secret mission.

8.SummaryEnglish: A NEW Fake Mori Summer appears, hell bent of taking Dekomori as her own. But her sinister motives are discovered and only the REAL Fake Mori Summer can make her relinquish her hold on Sanae!

9.SummaryEnglish: While helping Kumin's aunt run a shop by the beach, Rikka realizes that her powers are fading... and she may want them to.

10.TitleEnglish: Gauntlet of Rain (A Midsummer Night's... Rain and Whip)
10.SummaryEnglish: Shichimiya continues to wrestle with her newfound feelings, and only one thing can save her from herself: a showdown!

11.SummaryEnglish: Rikka is determined to find the necessary items to revive the Dark Flame Dragon, and puts herself in danger in the process.

12.SummaryEnglish: Rikka is acting strangely around Yuta, and it takes all of her courage to confess her true feelings to him.
